main_products.name: Hypothetical: Folio Project Management
main_products.description: Hypothetical: A cloud-based project management SaaS solution designed for small to medium-sized businesses. It offers task management, collaboration tools, time tracking, and reporting features.
key_features: Hypothetical: Gantt charts and Kanban boards
Hypothetical: Integration with popular productivity tools (e.g., Slack, Google Workspace)
main_products.target_users: Hypothetical: Small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs) in various industries, particularly those with remote or distributed teams.
main_products.pricing: Hypothetical: Tiered pricing based on the number of users and features. Free plan available for small teams.
main_products.competitive_position: Hypothetical: Aims to be a more user-friendly and affordable alternative to larger project management platforms like Asana and Jira.
